personBio.personBio: As a successful Special Events Planning and Management professional, Mercer has a unique blend of experience working with high-profile artists, promoting the work of charitable causes, and organizing domestic and international events and appearances. Throughout her career, Mercer has created and implemented strategies to build awareness, execute events, and manage operations of small to large-scale campaigns.

Two decade + career working at the intersection of fan & public relations, music entertainment, and communications with expertise in social media management & marketing, copywriting, and influencer engagement.

Twenty + year career leveraging high quality fan experiences and content to build long lasting lifestyle and music communities. My passion lies in creating the very best fan experience, first, then understanding how brand integration can improve it.

description.description:
Strategy & Messaging 
Event Development & Management 
Planning 
Influencer Engagement
Social Media Management
Ideation 
Copywriting 
Art Direction 
Production 
Branding

Clients come to us from a variety of starting points -- some have nothing, others already have an idea, or scripts. We don't have a preference, we're happy to participate in any or all stages.
